mapper.insert: insert into emp_status values(SEQ_EMP_NUM.NEXTVAL, sysdate, current_timestamp , null, #{empStatus}, null, #{mId}, null, null)
mapper.select: select * from emp_status e left join member m on (e.m_id = m.m_id) where e.m_id = #{id} and to_date(emp_regi_date,'YY/MM/DD') in (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM emp_status) and emp_on_time is not null and m_status = 0

select EMP_NUM, EMP_REGI_DATE, EMP_ON_TIME, EMP_OFF_TIME, EMP_STATUS, M_ID,SUBSTR(work_time , 9,9) work_time1, SUBSTR(over_time , 9,9) over_time1 from emp_status where m_id = #{id} and to_date(emp_regi_date,'YY/MM/DD') in (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM emp_status)

select substr(SUM(to_number(to_char(work_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))),6,2)||':'|| substr(SUM(to_number(to_char(work_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))),8,2)||':'|| substr(SUM(to_number(to_char(work_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))),10,2) as WORK_TIME1, SUM(to_number(to_char(over_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))) as OVER_TIME1 from emp_status where emp_regi_date between (select to_char(a.s_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') monday from ( select sysdate - (to_number(to_char(sysdate,'d'))-2) s_date from dual ) a) and (select to_char(a.s_date+6, 'yyyy-mm-dd') sunday from ( select sysdate - (to_number(to_char(sysdate,'d'))-2) s_date from dual) a) and m_id = #{id} group by m_id

select substr(SUM(to_number(to_char(work_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))),6,2)||':'|| substr(SUM(to_number(to_char(work_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))),8,2)||':'|| substr(SUM(to_number(to_char(work_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))),10,2) as WORK_TIME1, SUM(to_number(to_char(over_time, 'yyyymmddhh24missff'))) as OVER_TIME1 from emp_status where emp_regi_date between (select TRUNC(sysdate,'MM') from dual) and (select LAST_DAY(sysdate) from dual) and m_id = #{id} group by m_id
select * from emp_Status where emp_regi_date between (select to_date(#{currentYearMonth},'YYMM') from dual) and (select last_Day(to_date(#{currentYearMonth},'YYMM')) from dual) and m_id = #{id}
